overview: carefully reconstructs the events in Bolivia between 1979 and 1982. Dark years. Speaking of Alberto Natush's coup d'etat, the massacre of Todos Santos, the murders of Luis Espinal and Marcelo Quiroga Santa Cruz, the worker, peasant and student mobilizations, Garc√≠a Meza Tejada's coup d'etat and the return to the democratic process.
title: Las banderas del amanecer
